visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bar chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bar, Chart title: 'Total organic area 2012 and 2018', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be 'AUT', 'EST', 'SWE' with a title description 'Countries', Y-axis labels should be formatted as '{value} kha' with a tick interval of 500 and a description 'Organic area', Data series: Two series named '2012' and '2018' with corresponding data values, Custom colors: Use pattern fills for series colors, Additional configurations: Enable y-axis zooming, disable legend, and style tooltips with a specific background and border color.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a bar chart displaying the total organic area for three countries (AUT, EST, SWE) in the years 2012 and 2018. The chart includes a title and subtitle, with the subtitle linking to a source for the data. The X-axis is labeled with country codes and includes an accessibility description for screen readers. The Y-axis is formatted to display values in 'kha' with a tick interval of 500, and it also includes accessibility descriptions. The chart allows for y-axis zooming, which is useful for detailed analysis of the data. Data labels are enabled on the bars, showing the exact values in 'kha'. The tooltip is styled with a specific background and border color, enhancing user interaction. The legend is disabled, as the chart is straightforward with only two series. The series are differentiated by pattern fills, adding a visual distinction without relying solely on color, which is beneficial for accessibility.
